## SizeFilter type

Filter options that can be used on fields where size checks are supported.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SizeFilter = {
    between?: [number, number];
    eq?: number;
    ge?: number;
    gt?: number;
    le?: number;
    lt?: number;
    ne?: number;
};
```
